name: Zig Zag Jelly Cube
description:
Zig Zag Jelly Cube is the new challenging endless runner game to have fun with.

Feel the excitement and test your reflexes in Zig Zag Jelly Cube.

Just tap the screen to change the direction of the cube and try not to fall off the timber path!

Keep your fingers steady and improve your concentration with the Jelly Cube runner game! 

Stay focused and try to do as many zig-zags to achieve your best score.

Your Jelly’s speed increases throughout the game, so the challenge becomes more interesting.

If you love the thrill of turn racing, and you are a fan of dexterity training, you are sure to love this game.
